elements.name: Scenario End to End Shopping Product Web Shop

steps.name: input username standard_user and password secret_sauce to login to web
Click Add to Chart One of Products in Dashboard Product
Click Shopping Cart Icon with Number at The Right Top Corner
Input Form ID to Continue Checkout
